title: Daddy's Birthday Gang Bang
description: It’s Kelly’s eighteenth birthday, and she wakes up excited to see the car of her dreams sitting in the driveway. On her way out to see it, she’s accosted by her stepfather’s best friend, Dillon, who takes advantage of her in the bathroom. Then Dillon takes her out to the garage for a birthday spanking, and he, Kelly’s stepfather, and her step-uncle give her the birthday gift of a lifetime with an all-out family gang bang!
author: Tawny Black
